ovdesc.p: A PRODUCT.COMMISSION Property Class will allow users to configure
• Financial product line / product Group / Products those are eligible for commission calculation.
• To define if commission has to be paid immediately or is scheduled.
• To specify if clawback of commission has to be done

desc.p: Indicates the interest property based on which the scheduled commission is calculated. Should be an interest property on AA.PROPERTY
This field indicates if commission amortization has to be stopped when the financial activity takes place. Allowed value is Yes & is mutually exclusive with ONLINE.CHARGE.
The activity on the financial arrangement that should initiate commission processing. Should be a record in AA.ACTIVITY
The commission that gets paid to the agent when the financial activity takes place. Should be a charge property with type commission on AA.PROPERTY
When online commission conditions are defined at product group level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT
When online commission conditions are defined at product group level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT.GROUP
When online commission conditions are defined at product line level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT.LINE
When scheduled commission conditions are defined at product group level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT
When scheduled commission conditions are defined at product group level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT.GROUP
When scheduled commission conditions are defined at product line level. This will allow a record from AA.PRODUCT.LINE
The commission that gets paid to the agent on the defined schedule. Should be a charge property with type commission on AA.PROPERTY
TO define the actual frequency on which commission gets paid.
Defines the frequency name of the scheduled commission. Should be defined in the virtual file table AA.AGENT.COMMISSION.FREQUENCY
